data.actual_result: Only one of them shows up
data.expected_result: - 2 Members with the same name and picture should show up
data.short_description: 2 Members with the same name can't be detected in the "Members" Section. Only one of them will appear
data.steps_to_repro: - have 2 people with the same name (and maybe profile picture?) in one server -check the Member List in "Server Settings"
